name: Notion /dividers: Studio Ghibli Pack
description: What is this?Dividers in .png-format for you to make your Notion workspace your own!The Studio Ghibli Pack includes 32 amazing Studio Ghibli designs.How do I use my new dividers?After checkout you will be directed to a Notion doc with all the dividers in it. Duplicate it into your workspace. From there, you can copy and paste the ones you like to use them anywhere in your workspace!Stay up to date on new divider packs:https://twitter.com/NotionDividersWho made these?Me!
